column1: Little Goat Diner////Service: the Elvis waffles came promptly but it took another 15 minutes for the plain bagel to arrive (strange)....By the time I received the bagel
column2: my partner had nearly finished his waffles. Wah Wah. We tried to find our server whilst we were looking for the bagel
column3: but he had completely disappeared. Did I mention our coffees did not get filled once? Not once.
